docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A drug that is being taken for long periods by tens of thousands of infants and young children to prevent convulsions is ineffective and inhibits intellectual performance, at least temporarily, researchers have found.

headline.main: Drug for Babies' Seizures Is Found Ineffective and Perhaps Harmful

docs.snippet: LEAD: A drug that is being taken for long periods by tens of thousands of infants and young children to prevent convulsions is ineffective and inhibits intellectual performance, at least temporarily, researchers have found.
